title: barredowl presents: Cartoon Box
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:classic]]

[[include info:start]]
This is a drawing of [[[SCP-6080]]], by [[*user pastarasta1]], [[*user ValidClay]], and [[*user JackalRelated]].

You can find my old stuff [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/barredowl-s-kick-ass-art-page|here]]] and more SCP art [[[http://scpcommune.wikidot.com/svaria|here]]].

My Tumblr is [[[https://highwireshrimper.tumblr.com/|highwireshrimper]]] and my Instagram is also [[[https://www.instagram.com/highwireshrimper/|highwireshrimper]]]. I post a lot more than SCP art there if you want to see more of that!
[[include info:end]]

[[include component:image-block
name=http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Asvaria-4/original.png|
width=600px|
align=center|
caption=D-9926 and Grey wander through a strangely familiar place.]]
----

[[=]]
+++ Commentary
[[/=]]

I had an itch to draw something cartoony and stylish: and what better way to do that than to draw the cartoon SCP to rule them all?

[[[SCP-6080]]], by [[*user pastarasta1]], [[*user ValidClay]], and [[*user JackalRelated]], has been a favorite of mine ever since I read it. The last log elevates it to a whole other level -- it's atmospheric, it has amazing imagery and talent put behind its visuals, and it stands as probably the best I've ever read. I absolutely //had// to draw it for myself.

A lot of what I drew here is very informed by [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-pastarasta1-art-page-experience-rise-of-the-revenge-of-r|pastarasta's art]]]. It's unabashedly cartoony: stretched-out ovals for eyes and heads, and highly exaggerated perspective and colors. I thought it was a perfect fit to create a disorienting mood for the piece. [[[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edvard_Munch|Munch's art]]], and a lot of other expressionists, also had their hand in inspiring this work. I absolutely admire their messy yet attentive approach to textures (have for some time) and employed some of that in this work. 

I had a lot of fun with this! Really loved tackling pastarasta's style here; it's really neat and fun and I'm glad I got to do it. Thanks to Pasta as well as Clay and Jackal for writing 6080!

(You can find my very old stuff [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/barredowl-s-kick-ass-art-page|here]]]. Slightly newer stuff [[[http://scpcommune.wikidot.com/svaria|here]]], and my very recent socials in the info bar.)

----
